block-definition.s: load project from Google Drive $nl file id: %'id' api key: %'key'
block-definition.comment: There are three major steps to using this library. Step 1: Make a project. Click the file button and then click "Export project...", then upload the xml file to Google Drive. Then, share the xml file: change the General Access to "Anyone with the link", then change the access from "Viewer" to "Editor". Hold on to the ID from the xml file: the url format should be https://drive.google.com/file/d/YOUR_ID/view, where YOUR_ID is the ID that should be used. Step 2: Follow the instructions for getting a Google Drive API Key from https://elfsight.com/blog/how-to-use-google-drive-api-and-get-an-api-key. Hold on to the key! Step 3: Make a new project, and load this library. Then, paste your API Key and File ID into this block. Save the project, and when you click this block, the project should load!
